# [Interview #981: JordanCon 2013 - Q&A with Maria, Entry #28](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=981#28)

#### Terez

Did RJ leave any notes about the future work of the Red Ajah?

#### Maria Simons

Not that I've found.
